title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-6.4 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-6.4 - Definitions

State Regulations

In addition to the definitions in sections
45-1.3
and
45-2.3
of this Part: (a) Go-kart means a self-propelled motorized
vehicle that is designed to be driven on a go-kart track where the driver has
control over acceleration, deceleration, stopping and steering of the
vehicle. (b) Go-kart track means a
fixed and defined course designated for the operation of go-karts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
45-6.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
